about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for The World Next Door composed by Andrew Matteson.

Tracklist:
  • 01 Twin Worlds
  • 02 Welcome to Emrys
  • 03 The Channel Shrine
  • 04 Throw a Fireball!
  • 05 Grievances

  • 07 Off Limits
  • 08 Impasse

  • 10 Arkeo
  • 11 Best Intentions

  • 13 Star Dancer
  • 14 Alpha
  • 15 Weird Sword Stinger
  • 16 Human Savers Club
  • 17 Camaraderie
  • 18 The Forge Shrine
  • 19 Heating Up
  • 20 Critical
  • 21 Ballad for Persimmon
  • 22 The Undercroft Shrine
  • 23 Nightmare
  • 24 I Know You're Human
  • 25 Departure
  • 26 Born Ready
